title: Rainbow Options under Bayesian MS-VAR Process. (arXiv:2112.10447v3 [q-fin.MF] UPDATED)
abstract: This paper presents pricing and hedging methods for rainbow options and lookback options under Bayesian Markov-Switching Vector Autoregressive (MS--VAR) process. Here we assumed that a regime-switching process is generated by a homogeneous Markov process. An advantage of our model is it depends on economic variables and simple as compared with previous existing papers.

translated_title: 基于贝叶斯MS-VAR过程的彩虹期权
translated_abstract: 本文提出了基于贝叶斯马尔可夫状态转换向量自回归（MS-VAR） 过程的彩虹期权和回顾期权的定价和对冲方法。我们假设一个状态转换过程由同质马尔科夫过程产生。我们的模型的优点是依赖于经济变量且相对于以前的论文更为简单。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于贝叶斯MS-VAR模型的彩虹期权和回顾期权的定价和对冲方法，该模型简单且依赖于经济变量。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes pricing and hedging methods for rainbow options and lookback options under Bayesian MS-VAR process. The model is simple and depends on economic variables.
